scriptmanager.util

Class GZipUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • scriptmanager.util.GZipUtilities

  • public final class GZipUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains static methods for parsing files and input streams to determine GZip-format information. Used across many tools in the scripts package. Found on a stackoverflow thread (https://stackoverflow.com/questions/30507653/how-to-check-whether-file-is-gzip-or-not-in-java)
    Author:
    Olivia Lang
    See Also:
    ShiftCoord, BEDtoGFF, ExpandBED, SortBED, TwoColorHeatMap, ConvertChrNames, FilterBEDbyProximity, TagPileup, SearchMotif, BEDUtilities, CDTUtilities

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GZipUtilities() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean isGZipped(java.io.File f)
      Checks if File is gzipped by opening and reading the first two bytes for the GZip MAGIC value and then closing the file.
      static boolean isGZipped(java.io.InputStream in)
      Checks if InputStream is gzipped by reading the next two bytes for the GZip MAGIC value and then resets the file marker to the original start position.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • GZipUtilities

        public GZipUtilities()

    • Method Detail

      • isGZipped

        public static boolean isGZipped(java.io.InputStream in)
        Checks if InputStream is gzipped by reading the next two bytes for the GZip MAGIC value and then resets the file marker to the original start position.
        Parameters:
        in - the InputStream to check if Gzipped (assumes stream starts at the beginning of the file).
        Returns:
        returns true if bytes match GZip MAGIC and false if not.

      • isGZipped

        public static boolean isGZipped(java.io.File f)
        Checks if File is gzipped by opening and reading the first two bytes for the GZip MAGIC value and then closing the file.
        Parameters:
        f - the File to check if Gzipped.
        Returns:
        true if bytes match GZip MAGIC and false if not.
